page.title: 03Population
page.content: Because most of the housing in our area is on new estates either council or private,80% of the population is young with children of school age.The majority of householders are newcomers to the area and enjoy a relatively high standard of living because of high employment in oil and oil-related industries.Due to the nature of their work the population tends to be transient. In the rural parts of our block the population is more of a sedentary nature with their roots and culture firmly embedded in the North-East of Scotland.Several branches of the same family live and work within the vicinity with the resulting close knit community cohesiveness which is not so apparent in the town.
